com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.message

Class SketchMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.message.SketchMetadata

  • public abstract class SketchMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents sketch metadata. This data is sent when programming a Bean so that the Bean knows the name, size, and programming time of the sketch being sent.

        public static SketchMetadata create(SketchHex hex,
                                    java.util.Date timestamp)
        Create a SketchMetadata object with the given SketchHex data and programmed-at timestamp.
        Parameters:
        hex - The SketchHex to be sent
        timestamp - The time the bean will indicate it was programmed
        Returns:
        The SketchMetadata object
